title: Ray Tracing On GTX Graphics Cards - Don't Even Bother!
tags: shadow of the tomb raider rtx
description: NVIDIA recently rolled out an update that allows for GeForce RTX features to be used on GTX-series cards like the GTX 1660 Ti, GTX 1660 and GTX 1060.  Let's check out the performance benchmarks in games like Metro Exodus and Battlefield V.
